sentences.chinese: 以色列人在基比亚的四围设下伏兵。

sentences.english: Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.

sentences.english: The road ahead for Libya and its people will be difficult and full of challenges.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚面前的路将充满坎坷和挑战。

sentences.english: In Gambia 11 journalists have been jailed for extended periods in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 在冈比亚，11名记者在2006年被判长期徒刑。

sentences.english: So, those are the reasons predominantly why people cannot get out themselves.
sentences.chinese: 这就是人们为什么无法从利比亚撤出的主要原因。

sentences.english: The only oasis of life was in the highlands of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 生命的唯一绿洲在埃塞俄比亚高原。

sentences.english: More than 50 people in the Libyan capital Tripoli have died after drinking tainted alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚首都的黎波里50多人饮用毒酒身亡。

sentences.english: Lily: An English production of Cymbeline by Shakespeare.

sentences.english: Ben jonson tells us that shakespeare never had to revise a manuscript.

sentences.english: Aida is the story of a Nubian princess.

sentences.english: I am a therapist at columbia-presbyterian.

sentences.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespear's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司计划播放莎士比亚的全部戏剧。
